## IssuerResolver.resolve() method

resolve is a method to resolve a credential status directly from the issuer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
resolve(credentialStatus: CredentialStatus): Promise<RevocationStatus>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  credentialStatus | [CredentialStatus](./js-sdk.credentialstatus.md) | credential status to resolve |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[RevocationStatus](./js-sdk.revocationstatus.md)&gt;

`{Promise<RevocationStatus>}`
